content:
Anyone run into this bug? New chat messages for me were immediately being marked as read in the second they appeared. Other users on the server did not have an issue. Pop up notifications were working fine, but my unread message badges would always be 0.

I:

  • Logged out of everywhere I was logged in and only logged in with one browser
  • Cycled my API key
  • Turned off all browser extensions
  • Tried it in different browsers

Eventually restarting the server (to hide the registration links) caused my message badges to work again.
@Sean Wallitsch that is really quite strange.
It's still working fine after the server restart. Wish I could have tracked down what was going on
